items.answer: We handle orders from small batches to bulk quantities. Our flexible manufacturing allows customized production for various client needs.

aboutusintro.title: About Rajesh Metals
aboutusintro.subtitle: Precision Brass Manufacturing Since 1984
aboutusintro.description: Established in Jamnagar, Rajesh Metals has been a leading brass manufacturing specialist for nearly four decades. We combine traditional craftsmanship with modern technology to deliver exceptional brass components across various industries.

items.name: Rahul Patel
items.content: Rajesh Metals consistently delivers high-quality brass components with remarkable precision. Their attention to detail and timely delivery have been crucial to our projects.

items.name: Amit Sharma
items.content: We've been partnering with Rajesh Metals for over a decade. Their custom brass fittings and exceptional customer service set them apart in the industry.
